title: Staff Nurse
tagsAndSkills: Patient Monitoring,Documentation,Infection Control,Patient Care,Monitoring,Control

ambitionBoxData.Title: Padmashree Dr.D.Y.Patil University Reviews by Employees

jobDescription:
• Patient Care: Provide direct patient care including assessing, planning, implementing, and evaluating patient care plans in collaboration with physicians and other healthcare professionals.
  • Medication Administration: Administer medications and treatments as prescribed by the physician and in accordance with facility policies and procedures.
  • Patient Monitoring: Monitor and record patient vital signs, symptoms, and overall condition. Respond to changes in patient condition and take appropriate actions.
  • Documentation: Maintain accurate and up-to-date patient records and documentation in compliance with legal, regulatory, and institutional standards.
  • Patient Education: Educate patients and their families on health conditions, treatment plans, and self-care techniques to promote recovery and well-being.
  • Coordination of Care: Coordinate with other healthcare professionals and services to provide comprehensive care and support for patients.
  • Emergency Response: Act swiftly and effectively in emergency situations, following established protocols and procedures.
  • Infection Control: Adhere to infection control procedures and maintain a clean and safe environment for patients.
  • Professional Development: Participate in ongoing education and training to stay current with best practices, technological advancements, and regulatory requirements.

title: Sales Officer
tagsAndSkills: Project Sales,Specifications,Building Materials,Construction Chemicals,Waterproofing,Dealer Management,Industrial Sales,Sales And Marketing
jobDescription:
Role & responsibilities


PROJECT SALES OF CONSTRUCTION CHEMICALS

  • Develop and execute a strategic PROJECT SALES Plan to achieve sales targets and expand our market presence in the construction chemicals sector.
  • Identify and pursue new business opportunities by engaging with developers, industries, contractors, government and institutional customers, and other key stakeholders involved in construction projects.
  • Achieve the monthly sales and collection targets as defined for the assigned territory.
  • Build and maintain strong relationships with clients, providing technical support and guidance on the application of our construction chemicals.
  • Conduct product presentations and demonstrations to educate potential clients on the benefits and features of our products.
  • Prepare and submit regular sales reports, forecasts, and market analyses to the management team.

OR


DEALER / DISTRIBUTOR / RETAIL SALES OF CONSTRUCTION CHEMICALS

  • Identify and recruit new dealers and distributors to expand the network and increase market penetration.
  • Develop and maintain strong relationships with dealers and distributors to drive sales growth and achieve targets.
  • Provide product training and support to dealers and distributors to ensure they have the knowledge and tools needed to sell our products effectively.
  • Monitor sales performance of dealers and distributors, providing guidance and support to maximize their sales potential.
  • Conduct regular visits to dealer and distributor locations to assess their needs, collect orders and payments, gather feedback, and provide support.
  • Prepare and present sales reports, forecasts, and performance analyses to the management team.

OR


SPECIFICATIONS / APPROVALS / BUSINESS DEVELOPMENT OF CONSTRUCTION CHEMICALS

  • Drive the initiative to promote and secure the specifications of Construction Chemicals with Consultants / Architects / Govt. Departments / DEVELOPERS / INDUSTRIES / etc.
  • Achieve the specification sales targets and expand our market presence in the construction chemicals sector.
  • Identify and pursue new business opportunities by engaging with architects, consultants, government departments, industries, developers and other influencers and key decision-makers in the construction industry.
  • Conduct technical presentations and seminars to educate specifiers on the benefits and applications of our construction chemicals.
  • Collaborate with the sales teams to convert specifications into sales.
  • Prepare and submit regular reports on specification activities, project status, and market insights to the management team.

Preferred candidate profile

  • Bachelors degree or Diploma in Civil Engineering.
  • Experience of 0-5 years in Project Sales / Dealer Sales / Specifications in the Construction Chemicals or Building Materials industry.
  • Should have handled Project Sales / Dealer Sales / Specifications in Construction Chemicals or Building Materials industry in the defined territory for this position.
  • Strong technical knowledge and understanding of construction chemicals and their applications.
  • Ability to build and maintain relationships with a diverse range of stakeholders.
  • Excellent communication, negotiation, and interpersonal skills.
  • Computer proficiency in Microsoft Office (Excel, PowerPoint, Word) and emails.

title: Marketing Manager - Fresher
tagsAndSkills: Marketing,lead generation,Client Servicing,branding,client management,Business development,corporate sales,sales
jobDescription:
About Us: We are a client servicing organization with a history of 25 years history. We hire candidates, train and develop them in various aspects of Marketing . To cultivate effective marketing managers, we ensure they acquire a comprehensive understanding of various departments encompassing Branding and Promotion, Sales and Marketing and more. This approach enhances their understanding of the corporate sector, fostering well-rounded expertise.
You will begin your role with sales and marketing, client management, business strategy and your growth would be into the management profile.

RESPONSIBILITIES-
~Responding to Customers' Needs. ~Keeping an Eye on Trends and Monitoring Competition.
~Communicating work and brand values with Marketing Team.
~Developing a Growth Strategy.

Please contact HR- 9324483283 to validate your eligibility

*Age 18-27
*Freshers can apply
*Immediate joiner
*Work Experience 0-3 years

Location- Thane,Navi Mumbai,Mumbai,Dombivli,Panvel, mumbai all areas, MUMBAI SUBURBS, kalyan,


Benefits:

Competitive base salary with performance-based incentives.
Comprehensive benefits package, including health insurance.
Opportunities for professional growth and advancement.
Dynamic and collaborative work environment.


If you are a sales and marketing enthusiast, we invite you to join Caliber Organisation as a Sales and Marketing Executive. Please contact our HR at 9324483283 for further clarifications.

competitive analysis, and developing long-term growth strategies in collaboration with function
